about-introduction: I'm Martin. A full-stack developer. I use JavaScript mainly, that's why I use Node.js, Express as a framework, MongoDB and React.
about-else: I'm also open to using C#, SQL and more. I translate applications such as Bouncer or Bitwarden.
about-3d-engineering: I used to do 3D models and drawings related to engineering. Check out my profile on GrabCAD.
about-contact-me: If you wish to contact me you can do so via e-mail: email@martinchoutka.cz
